Title: Our Mrs. Reynolds
Plot: While completing a job on a backwater world, Mal is married to a village girl without his knowledge. The girl, Saffron, gets onboard and the crew does not find her until they're already in the air. Mal is not sure what to do with her, but let her come along.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Jason Gray, Christina Hendricks, Benito Martinez, Erik Passoja, Bob Fimiani, Alex Stemjkovsky, Zachary Woodlee
